info.title: Jokes One API
info.description: Jokes One API offers a complete feature rich REST API access to its jokes platform.  This is the documentation for the world famous [jokes API](https://jokes.one/api/joke/).  If you are a subscriber and you are trying this from a console add 'X-JokesOne-Api-Secret' header and add your api key as the header value. You can test and play with the API right here on this web page. For using the private end points and subscribing to the API please visit https://jokes.one/api/joke/.

tags.name: jod
tags.description: Access joke of the day service. Use this to get the joke of the day in various categories. This is a free API that is available to public. You must credit Jokes One if you are using the free version.

tags.name: joke
tags.description: Access random joke service. Use this to get random jokes , jokes filtered by authors or tags etc. You need an API key to access this service.

get.description:
Gets `Joke of the Day`.
Optional `category` param determines
the category of returned joke of the day

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<response>
  <success>
    <total>1</total>
  </success>
  <contents>
    <jokes>
      <category>animal</category>
      <title>Animal Joke of the day </title>
      <description>Animal Joke of the day </description>
      <background/>
      <joke>
        <title>Elephant with Diarrhea</title>
        <length>67</length>
        <clean>0</clean>
        <racial>0</racial>
        <date>2018-11-05</date>
        <id>1tO_XKcm3_qYMkk0k19HEgeF</id>
        <text>What do you give an elephant with diarrhea?    Lots of room. </text>
      </joke>
    </jokes>
    <copyright>2018-20 https://jokes.one</copyright>
  </contents>
</response>

get.description: Gets a list of `Joke of the Day` Categories.

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<response>
  <success>
    <total>1</total>
  </success>
  <contents>
    <jokes>
      <title>Anti aircraft weapon</title>
      <length>212</length>
      <clean/>
      <racial/>
      <id>pZdOqARLsLVZ84EkBcWptAeF</id>
      <text>
The USA blamed the Russian companies that they were supplying Bagdad with the elastic band for pants. Iraq engineers made the catapults of them and now Iraq soldiers are striking a blow to American air forces.

</text>
    </jokes>
    <copyright>2018-20 https://jokes.one</copyright>
  </contents>
</response>

put.description: Add a new joke to your private collection.

delete.description: Delete a joke. The user needs to be the owner of the joke to be able to delete it.

get.description: Gets a list of `Joke` Categories, based on a query term.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls where response starts the listing at

get.description: Get the list of jokes in your private collection.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls where response starts the listing at

get.description: Gets a `Random Joke`. When you are in a hurry this is what you call to get a random famous joke.

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<response>
  <success>
    <total>1</total>
  </success>
  <contents>
    <jokes>
      <title>Blonde tap dancer</title>
      <length>86</length>
      <clean>0</clean>
      <racial>0</racial>
      <id>SVEPCMsk3SbyeWZbERGzKQeF</id>
      <text>What happened to the blonde tap dancer? 
She slipped off and fell down the drain.

</text>
    </jokes>
    <copyright>2018-20 https://jokes.one</copyright>
  </contents>
</response>

get.description: Search for a `Joke` in Jokes One platform. Optional `category` , `author`, `minlength`, `maxlength` params determines the filters applied while searching for the joke.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: keyword to search for in the joke

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Should search private collection? Default searches public collection.

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<response>
  <success>
    <total>1</total>
  </success>
  <contents>
    <jokes>
      <title>Blonde tap dancer</title>
      <length>86</length>
      <clean>0</clean>
      <racial>0</racial>
      <id>SVEPCMsk3SbyeWZbERGzKQeF</id>
      <text>What happened to the blonde tap dancer? 
She slipped off and fell down the drain.

</text>
    </jokes>
    <copyright>2018-20 https://jokes.one</copyright>
  </contents>
</response>

post.description: Add a tag to a given Joke.
Remove a tag from a given joke.

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific joke in jokes.one.

image.description: Image URL that can be used for background to display this joke.

date.description: Date this joke of the day belongs to
